```{r}

# load libraries
```

```{r chen code}

here()

# run Chen's script to make the imputed dataset
source(here::here("scripts", 
                  "01-get-data.R"))

# save file to disk
save(frm.wide, 
     file = here("data", 
                 "frm_wide.rdata"))

```


```{r looking at the data}

                 "frm_wide.rdata"))

# check if we have NAs
sum(is.na(frm.wide))
```
